PageTitle: vpn-instance(Bas IP address pool view/Address pool group view )
FuncDef:
The vpn-instance command binds a VPN instance to an address pool group.
The undo vpn-instance command binds a public VPN instance to an address pool group.
By default, a public network VPN instance is bound to an address pool group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The vpn-instance command is used to bind a VPN instance to an address pool group
Prerequisites
Both the address pool group and the VPN instance have been created.
Precautions
The address pool group and its member pools must be bound to the same VPN instance.
The address pool group and the domain to which the address pool group belongs must be bound to the same VPN instance.
